rationale: The paper provides a useful architecture pattern for iterative self-improvement with real feedback, but practical confidence is limited by assumption-heavy theory and narrow empirical scope. It is suitable for controlled research deployment with strict auditability and gating, not immediate autonomous production trading.
rejection_reasons: Reject immediate full-production rollout because the theoretical guarantees depend on assumptions that are not validated for non-stationary market conditions.
Reject autonomous live usage because empirical evidence is mostly directional and lacks robust statistical uncertainty reporting.
Reject direct strategy promotion without broader regime validation and production-grade execution-friction controls.
recommendations: Implement the two-loop architecture in deterministic shadow mode with complete artifact capture.
Require walk-forward, cost-aware robustness gates before any promotion decision.
Run explicit component ablations and repeated-seed evaluations with confidence intervals.
Add KB governance controls (quality scoring, dedupe, provenance checks, decay/retirement).
Keep human approval mandatory for any transition beyond paper trading.
follow_up_actions: Validate performance on multi-year, multi-regime datasets beyond China A-share 2023.
Quantify sensitivity to slippage, spread, market impact, and turnover constraints.
Publish reproducibility manifests and seed-level variance summaries for all headline metrics.
